QUALIFICATION: as Helix subcylindrica Linnaeus (Wilson1993); Histoire naturelle des principales productions de l'Europe méridionale, 4: 124; Placed on the Official List by Opinion 344, 1955, Opinions and Declarations rendered by the ICZN, 10(11): 315, with Truncatella laevigata Risso, 1826 as type-species by selection by Woodward (1854); the reference given is to Woodward, 1851, A manual of the Mollusca: 137, which gives as type-species T. truncatula Draparnaud [Cyclostoma truncatulum Draparnaud, 1801], not an originally included nominal species
